questions.question: A cocktail dress or a new handbag? Please describe below what you’re looking to find. Be sure to include the “look” or style you want, where you’ll wear the outfit or use the accessories, sizes, your favorite designers, labels and retailers, and anything else important to you about the items.

A business suit or swim trunks? Or, maybe it’s a new watch? What items are you looking to find? And, be sure to include important details below, like the occasion (work?, beach?), brands and retailers that you like, sizes, colors and other things important to you about the items.

Nursery furnishings? Or, kid’s apparel and toys? Please describe below what kind of item(s) you are looking to find. And, be sure to include a little more about the child, such as age, gender, sizes and any favorite colors or interests they have.

Dressing up a living room with pillows and throws? Or, looking for the best blender? Please describe the items you’re looking to find below. Be sure to include details that are important to you, such as where and how you’ll use the item(s), colors, styles, the “look” you want, sizes, and brand or retailer preferences.

Recommendation for a new skin care line or best organic health supplements? Please describe below the kinds of products you’re looking to find. And, be sure to include specifics such as what you want the product to do for you, your skin or hair type and condition, favorite brands or retailers, colors, and other nuances important to you.

A birthday gift for the boss, or a Father’s day gift for dad? Tell us more about the gift occasion and who the gift is for. Be sure to specifics like their age, gender, any interests & hobbies, and types of gifts you think they tend to enjoy. If the gift needs to be delivered quickly, that’s important to note.

A deal on a flat screen TV? Or, the best headphones for full, immersive sound? What kind of electronics equipment are you looking to find? Be sure to share details important for recommending the right products for you, such as how you’ll use the item(s), features that are “must haves,” important dimensions (such as for TVs), and brands or retailers you prefer.

Need a recommendation for a treadmill? Or, hockey gear for an 8 year old? Please describe below what you’re looking to find. Be sure to include details such as the sport, the age and gender of the person using the equipment, the specific item(s) you need (if you know), colors, sizes, skill level of the user, and any retailers or brands you prefer.

Need recommendations for a weekend getaway in New York? Or, tickets to local events? Please describe below your location, your destination (if you’re looking to travel), preferences for air travel and hotels, and types of events and entertainment you enjoy.

Need help finding items for that DIY project? Please describe the project you want to do. And, be sure to include specifics such as your overall goal for the project, particular items you think you will need, preferences in materials or styling, and other particulars about the project.

Members of Maven Xchange can help you find almost anything. Please describe below what you’re looking to find, how you’ll use it and the aspects of the item that are important for others to know when making recommendations for you.
